transcript: if your free content is valuable they will like you more and stay loyal to your business as a paying customer longer because they don't separate where they got value from they just know they got value from you and that the value they got was in acccess of what they paid and so in a very real way more amazing free content retains the people who choose to pay you're not disenfranchising the people who are paying you you're just further reinforcing that you are the right choice
